content: I've pushed a PR for the security release, drafted the SA, and started on release notes. I'm going to be in a meeting until 1pm, but should be back after that to finish up change records and help with the release :)
Please feel free to merge all the RTBC things!!!! :) @quicksketch @BWPanda @Herb or whoever else can help!

@quicksketch this is a safe one: https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop/pull/3520/files

Issue #4915: Replace 'locale' with 'langcode' in install.sh. by BWPanda · Pull Request #3520 · backdrop/backdrop
Fixes backdrop/backdrop-issues#4915

this one also. minimal change: https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/2836

Unable to Filter Aliases on URL aliases page · Issue #2836 · backdrop/backdrop-issues
Describe your issue or idea I'm not able to use the URL alias filter on the URL Aliases page for any URL containing a slash /. Steps to reproduce (if reporting a bug) navigate to the Url aliase...

this one just adds two update functions: https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop/pull/3504 (I'll fix the release notes)

Issue #4888: add _config_translatables if incomplete by indigoxela · Pull Request #3504 · backdrop/backdrop
Fixes backdrop/backdrop-issues#4888 Add missing translatables in an update hook.

this one is also minimal change for huge benefit: https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/1324

Views exposed sort is not working. · Issue #1324 · backdrop/backdrop-issues
To reproduce: create a view add at least one sort criteria click on that sort criteria to edit it 3a) check the box for "Expose this sort to visitors, to allow them to change it" Apply th...

This is also a good one, minimal changes, and new tests! https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4856

The "this is a preview" message appears after content has saved · Issue #4856 · backdrop/backdrop-issues
Description of the bug When you preview a node, you see a warning message stating that the node you are viewing has not yet been saved. This is good. However, when you click the "save" bu...

Also minimal, a change to an update function (only for sites newly moving from D7) https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4889

D7 upgrade: language negotiation setting for multilingual sites not migrated properly · Issue #4889 · backdrop/backdrop-issues
Description of the bug When upgrading from Drupal 7, the language detection configuration does not get set. Steps To Reproduce Create a D7 site with multiple languages, with path prefix set for lan...

This is a good one too, tiny change to prevent PHP noice, and API docs update! https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4886

Notice: Undefined index: label in filter_admin_format_form() (line 245 of /var/www/docroot/core/modules/filter/filter.admin.inc). · Issue #4886 · backdrop/backdrop-issues
Description of the bug Implementation of hook_editor_info() in a custom module's function produces the error: Notice: Undefined index: label in filter_admin_format_form() (line 245 of /var/www/...

This is a fantastic tiny change :) https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4901

Field UI: (Almost) empty page titles on display settings pages for user and comment · Issue #4901 · backdrop/backdrop-issues
Description of the bug It starts in field_ui_menu(), where comment and user entities have no bundle argument, so only the string (bundle name) can get handed over to function field_ui_display_form(...

This one is an important fix https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4880 (and minimal!)

Backdrop 1.18 shows as "security update" · Issue #4880 · backdrop/backdrop-issues
Not sure if this is a bug, so I start it as a question. On sites that had 1.18.0-preview installed (for testing), 1.18.0 shows as "security update". The "Available update" page ...
All of those please :sweat_smile:
I'm starting work in ~1hr, so won't be able to help much. Sorry.

Also this is a quick one-line fix! https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4514

Views link to node translation not showing · Issue #4514 · backdrop/backdrop-issues
Description of the bug The "Translate link" in views never shows because of a mistake in an if clause. Steps To Reproduce To reproduce the behavior: Enable Content Translation module, add...
@quicksketch I reviewed all the RTBC issues in 1.18.1 and I think they all look a-ok for today's release :) Nothing worrisome and all good fixes! Also, @indigoxela thank you so much for so many PRs!
@jenlampton Updated PR as requested, but looks like you already moved issue to next milestone...
We can move it back, see if we can sneak it in :)
@quicksketch has a meeting in 30 mins @BWPanda maybe you can help review/merge some of these other issues?
Also @quicksketch don't forget https://github.com/backdrop-ops/security/issues/109.
All issue titles cleaned up, ready for release notes generator :)
Tags are cut for 1.18.1 and 1.17.6. @jenlampton Can you close the milestone and publish the releases?
yes!
@bwpanda where do I find the changelog?

Found it :) https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/actions

backdrop/backdrop-issues
Issue tracker for Backdrop core. Contribute to backdrop/backdrop-issues development by creating an account on GitHub.
Obviously because the security issue was in another repo and not added to this milestone, it's not included. So you'll have to add that manually.
yes, I already have that one in the notes

ok, can I get a sanity check review on https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4896#issuecomment-768540405

Backdrop 1.18.1 Release checklist · Issue #4896 · backdrop/backdrop-issues
Release scheduled for Jan 27, 2021 - 1pm PT - 3pm PT Pre-release tasks Merge commits @quicksketch Create the next bugfix milestone @jenlampton Move all unfinished issues to the next bugfix release ...
@BWPanda we also have some heading-weight issues. Can you add another # before the sub-headings for types of issues?
I can replace the bold headings with ## in the release notes. Then we can have ## for headings and ###for sub-headings
@stpaultim I am going to do the tweet since I haven't seen you here yet today :)

@jenlampton I'm not sure it's currently possible (I couldn't see an option for that). But I've opened an issue to ask if it's currently (or in future) possible: https://github.com/spring-io/github-changelog-generator/issues/56

Specify heading levels · Issue #56 · spring-io/github-changelog-generator
Is it possible to specify the level of the headings in the Markdown file? For example, currently my Markdown is being output like so: ## Bug fixes - ... But I'd instead like it to be: ### Bug f...
I just got two security announcement emails...?
@BWPanda were they the same?
Hm, I also got 2.
@BWPanda I just noticed a config file changed on b.org live for tugboat settings, is that something that happens automatically? or was it manually updated?
Manually
Just doing Tugboat stuff now
I wonder if we should combine that task and the b.org site update?
or mabe combine that task with the home page update?
one setting instead of two?
Sure
should the home page pull from the tugboat setting or vice versa? or should both pull from a master?
I think the Tugboat setting needs to happen after the other Tugboat stuff (otherwise people trying to Demo button will have problems).
The setting in question is literally just changing the Git Ref value here: https://backdropcms.org/admin/config/services/tugboat (i.e. from 1.18.0 to 1.18.1)
okay, well then maybe they do need to stay separate :)
Maybe just make a note that updating B.org shouldn't happen until after the homepage and Tugboat have been updated?
That's a good idea.
